refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The uri_portnum returns the port number from a URI.

listitem.para: The source URI to retrieve the port number from.

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: If the URI has a port number, its value will be returned. The port number can be any integer which is greater than or equal to zero.
If an error occurs, uri_portnum returns -1, and sets errno accordingly. If the URI does not have a port number, uri_portnum returns -1 and sets errno to ENOENT.

refsect1.title: Diagnostics
refsect1.para: In the event of an error ocurring, errno may be set to:

listitem.para: The URI does not include a port number.
